## GoogleAdditionalInformationQuestions.alcoholAndTobaccoRelatedContent property

From the copy of the question:

Do your Actions contain alcohol or tobacco-related content? If yes, you must include age verification at the beginning of the conversation. If your Actions mainly sell alcohol or tobacco, you must implement account linking and verify that the user meets legal age requirements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alcoholAndTobaccoRelatedContent?: boolean;
```
